text: Nankana Sahib railway station (, ) is located in Nankana Sahib city, Nankana Sahib district of Punjab province of the Pakistan. This station is now renamed to "Baba Guru Nanak railway station.ننکانہ صاحب ریلوے اسٹیشن کا نام بدل کر بابا گورونانک اسٹیشن رکھ دیا گیا ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Nankana Sahib District Category:Railway stations on Shorkot–Sheikhupura line
title: Nankana Sahib railway station
